name: Machine Learning Tools in Java (MLJ)
short_description: Java port and extension of MLC++ 2.0 by Kohavi et al.  Currently contains ID3, C4.5, Naive (aka Simple) Bayes, and FSS and CHC (genetic algorithm) wrappers for feature selection.  WEKA 3 interfaces are in development.
